verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We will not falter in the battle, For by the grace of God we’ll stand, And while we use our Captain’s armor, No one can pluck us from His hand; He is our confidence and courage, While we obey we’ll never fall; Let us be true, and fight in Jesus’ might, Follow our mighty Captain’s call.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: We will not fear the foe’s appearance, For we are led by Christ our King: He is the Captain of Salvation, And of His conquests we will sing; He is our confidence and courage, He is the One Who set us free; And with our hearts aglow we’ll rout the foe, For He has promised victory!
